ygData.subject: Re: dragon twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would just keep 2 up.  Nagafen s AE dd spell also debuffs now, so when he hits your party with it they will lose a buff.  What would be most benefecial
ygData.messageBody:
> That being said, if I weezle into the prime nag group,
> has it been your experience to try and keep just
> guardian and elemental rhythms up or should I go for 3
> (I'm very good at twisting without queues so heavy lag
> won't hamper keeping 3 up 90% of the time). If 3,
> then what to add?

I would just keep 2 up. Nagafen's AE dd spell also debuffs now,
so when he hits your party with it they will lose a buff. What would be
most benefecial would be if one of your rhythm songs was the first buff so
it will be the one lost, and you can replace it within another tick of
losing it (that way they won't lose the buffs that can't be replaced mid
fight).

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
